21/EOTS (end of #tweetstorm)
20/Here's to working together to create a better and more authentically connected world in the decades ahead.
19/We are entering the most exciting time in human history for creators and innovators.
18/Synthetic biology is here. Clean energy is here. Global connection is here. The platforms are being built. Change is accelerating.
17/As a we enter the Innovation Age, we millennials stand on the shoulders of so many inspiring innovators who have come before us.
16/Now is the time to create a better world for all people. Now is the time to create a connected world.
15/So much is possible in a world in which all people have access to food, water, shelter, education, medicine, electricity and internet.
14/The Apollo Mission of our generation is creating a clean-energy powered world in which all people have access to basic needs.
13/Wonderfully, Millennials will be leading the next three decades.
12/There is a palpable sense that leaders of the millennial generation see beyond divisions of national borders and religious identities.
11/The four billion digital natives born btwn 1980 and 2014 intuitively understand global connection, technology, and rapid innovation.
10/The greater the cultural interconnection the faster memes can replicate, learnings can be shared + the faster human progress can be made.
9/We‚Äôre culturally evolving as a species faster than ever before due to rapid communication tools which spread understanding across borders.
8/The rate of ideas spreading is a function of the speed of communication tools and the level of species interconnection.
7/The rate of human progress is a function of the rate of ideas spreading.
6/I believe greater global connection will lead to greater global understanding, consciousness and empathy.
5/Instead of lucky few having access to free cloud education soon all humans will be able to access @EdX, @Wikipedia, and @KhanAcademy.
4/Imagine the world the next generation will create when we are all connected globally.
3/The Innovation Age will begin in late-2015 when for the first time more than half of humanity is connected to internet.
2/The Information Age began w/ the Mark I in 1950 and will end in late-2015 when 50% of humanity is connected to the internet for first time
1/The Industrial Age began with the invention of the Newcomen engine in 1712 and ended with the creation of the Mark I computer in 1950.
